function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Stigma associated with contracting COVID-19 and social distancing messages exacerbating social marginalization.","Impact":"Short-term impacts such as eviction and job loss, long-term consequences for social and economic integration.","Mitigation":"Education and awareness campaigns, community support and empowerment, destigmatization efforts.","Technologies":"Social media campaigns, community engagement platforms, digital outreach tools.","People":"Those who have contracted COVID-19, marginalized communities, urban populations.","Owner":"Community organizations, healthcare providers, local authorities."},{"Description":"States of emergency and 'emergency thinking' may preclude locally led and adapted responses, hindering effectiveness and harm reduction.","Impact":"Ineffectiveness of response, exacerbation of harm in urban settings.","Mitigation":"Advocacy for the inclusion of bottom-up approaches, capacity building for local organizations, collaboration with local authorities.","Technologies":"Communication platforms, advocacy tools, capacity building resources.","People":"Local communities, urban residents, humanitarian organizations.","Owner":"Advocacy groups, humanitarian organizations, local authorities."}]}
